submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        verticalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        hp = 1
        vp = 1
        ans = 0
        hi = 0
        vi = 0
        while hi < len(horizontalCut) and vi < len(verticalCut):
            if horizontalCut[hi] >= verticalCut[vi]:
                ans += horizontalCut[hi] * vp
                hp += 1
                hi += 1
            else:
                ans += verticalCut[vi] * hp
                vp += 1
                vi += 1
        while hi < len(horizontalCut):
            ans += horizontalCut[hi] * vp
            hi += 1
        while vi < len(verticalCut):
            ans += verticalCut[vi] * hp
            vi += 1
        
        return ans
